name: Detective Tunes
short: Music recognition and preview web app.
long: Detective Tunes is a user-friendly tool designed to enhance music accessibility. This web application enables users to discover music and stores previously detected songs in a relational database for future references.

name: jallenyu.com
long: My personal portfolio website features my background, skill sets, and projects, all seamlessly integrated with responsive design principles to ensure smooth user experiences across various screen sizes.

name: InterNet
long: I collaborated with 3 other teammates to design and implement a web application to facilitate the search for suitable internships for students. The platform provides a diverse range of available internships and utilizes each user's background to match them with appropriate opportunities.

name: Twitch Channel Analysis
short: Quantitative analysis on various Twitch channels.
long: I led a team of two in collecting Twitch channel data from SullyGenome.com and conducting quantitative analysis. Leveraging libraries such as Beautiful Soup, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn, we efficiently web scraped channel statistics and produced informative visualization to address our research questions.

name: Movie Recommendation System
long: I collaborated with a team of four to analyze IMDb datasets, which included over 1,000 movies. Our objective was to develop a movie recommendation system aimed at enhancing user experience and engagement.

name: Unbeatable Tic-Tac-Toe
short: Player against unbeatable AI in a game of Tic-Tac-Toe.
long: Leveraging my knowledge from an AI course, I implemented an AI that plays Tic-Tac-Toe using the Minimax algorithm, a popular decision-making algorithm. To optimize search runtime, I integrated the Alpha-beta pruning algorithm. The AI showcases efficient gameplay and strategic decision-making.
